Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Southbound Reroute near Central Park/16th
ShortDescription: Southbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, 16th and Central Park: due to, street blockage near Central Park/16th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, 16th and Central Park: due to, street blockage near Central Park/16th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Central Park and 54th/Cermak
ShortDescription: Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between Central Park and 54th/Cermak due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between Central Park and 54th/Cermak due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at Cicero.

As a result, trains are operating only between The Loop and Central Park at this time.

  • Shuttle buses have been requested between Central Park and 54th/Cermak to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
